metadata.title: Thursday, 25th July, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to develop a rural based ecological policy for mitigating climate change;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) whether such a policy will be supported by a legislative framework.

questions.minister: Minister of Health when the following health posts in Mbabala Parliamentary Constituency will be operationalised
Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security what measures the Government is implementing to enhance service delivery in the Police Service, countrywide.

parts: (a) whether there are any secondary schools in Chitambo District that are earmarked for provision of internet connectivity;
(b) if so, how many schools are earmarked for the exercise;
(c) what the names of the schools are; and
(a) whether the Government has any plans to clear canals leading to the following Wards in Chilubi Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Katamba; (vi) Mubemba; (ii) Chishiba; (vii) Chinkundu; (iii) Bumba; (viii) Chiloba; and (iv) Lwangwa; (ix) Mofu;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
